snippet.title: 『Hero Must Die. again』Teaser PV
snippet.description:
The hero defeated the demon Guile, but lost his life in the process. Given five more days to put his affairs in order, guide him to the best possible funeral in this anti-RPG where he grows weaker.

Web：https://promo.degicagames.com/heromustdieagain/

Steam：https://store.steampowered.com/app/1054050/Hero_must_die_again/



© 2007 - 2020 G-MODE, Shoji Masuda/Pyramid
